title: Teemoing Skin Sales a little poor
body:
Hello, i would like to talk about the skin deals.

The skin deals i got were mostly based on that i play tristana so i got many adc skins although i don't actually play tristana as an adc so it is kind of my fault but even then the other adcs the skins were for i don't ever play where i do play some other adcs like varus or cait although again not in that role.

Really if i already didn't have enough rp to buy all the skins in this sale than riot would have missed out on me buying rp but they were lucky i purchased a lot before the sale as they would have got nothing, so this is more to also get riot more sales as well as players getting skins they want.

Its a bit sad because these are some really nice reductions but i just don't want any of them, so i think it would really help if riot improved their way of giving out skin deals to not only make us more happy but it also gets them more money atleast i would assume.
